english.segment1: I prayed a prayer for wisdom like a farmer prays for rain. 'Cause I knew that I must have it to survive in this life. And I stared out in the distance 'cause it seemed so far away. And I waited for the lightning. But the thunder and the lightning never came. So I took a look beside me to my left and to my right. And saw people full of wisdom all around in my life. And it started to come clearer I began to understand. that my prayer was being answered it's all part of God's plan
english.segment2: If we walk with the wise we will grow wise ..wo..wo. If we walk in the light then our path will be bright I know. There's someone who's already been where we must go. In the light of what they've learned we find. That we will grow wise if we walk with the wise
